
My `GeForce GTX 960M` device gives the following binary:

```txt
//
// Generated by NVIDIA NVVM Compiler
// Compiler built on Wed Dec 24 08:53:51 2014 (1419411231)
// Driver
//

.version 4.1
.target sm_50, texmode_independent
.address_size 32


.entry sum(
	.param .u32 .ptr .global .align 4 sum_param_0,
	.param .u32 .ptr .global .align 4 sum_param_1,
	.param .u32 .ptr .global .align 4 sum_param_2
)
{
	.reg .s32 	%r<14>;
	.reg .f32 	%f<4>;


	ld.param.u32 	%r1, [sum_param_0];
	ld.param.u32 	%r2, [sum_param_1];
	ld.param.u32 	%r3, [sum_param_2];
	mov.b32	%r4, %envreg3;
	mov.u32 	%r5, %ntid.x;
	mov.u32 	%r6, %ctaid.x;
	mov.u32 	%r7, %tid.x;
	add.s32 	%r8, %r7, %r4;
	mad.lo.s32 	%r9, %r6, %r5, %r8;
	shl.b32 	%r10, %r9, 2;
	add.s32 	%r11, %r1, %r10;
	ld.global.f32 	%f1, [%r11];
	add.s32 	%r12, %r2, %r10;
	ld.global.f32 	%f2, [%r12];
	add.f32 	%f3, %f1, %f2;
	add.s32 	%r13, %r3, %r10;
	st.global.f32 	[%r13], %f3;
	ret;
}
```
